hey guys, when I installed Need for Speed MW it asked me to insert disk-2, what I did was: press ctrl+alt+del -> close everything (installation window) -> Unzip the Crack folder -> run speed.exe and have fun ^-^ (p.s.: I don't know if this is going to work because I didn't dowload this torrent yet, but just like I said, I did this with NFSMW and it worked (almost same thing with NFS Carbon), so.....try this, maybe your game will work ^-^
